text: Super Discount is the debut album by French DJ and producer Étienne de Crécy. Although the track listing lists several artists, the majority of the credited artists are aliases for de Crécy alone or in collaboration. The album was followed in 2004 by the sequel release Super Discount 2. ==Reception== In 1997, Q ranked the album in their list of "The 25 Best Dance Albums Ever".Q; October 1997 issue. ==Track listing== # "Le patron est devenu fou !" ("The Boss has Become Mad!") – 10:06 (Minos Pour Main Basse (Sur La Ville)) # "Prix choc" ("Shock Price") – 8:51 (Étienne de Crécy) # "Super Disco" – 6:34 (Alex Gopher) # "Soldissimo (EDC Remix)" – 5:23 (Air) # "Affaires à faire" ("Bargains Galore") – 5:36 (La Chatte Rouge) # "Tout doit disparaître" ("Everything Must Go") – 6:23 (Minos Pour Main Basse (Sur La Ville)) # "Tout à 10 balles" ("Everything for 10 Bucks") – 0:09 (DJ Tall) # "Liquidation totale" ("Full Liquidation") – 6:17 (Étienne de Crécy) # "Les 10 jours fous" ("10 Days of Madness") – 8:30 (Mooloodjee) # "Destockage massif" ("Massive Stock Clearance") – 3:39 (Alex Gopher) # "Fermeture définitive" ("Closing Down") – 0:15 (Mr Learn) ; 1998 re-release disc 2 # "Prix Choc (Ultra Dark Mix)" – 6:27 (Étienne de Crécy) # "Prix Choc (Ultra Bright Mix)" – 7:49 (Étienne de Crécy) # "Le Patron Est Devenu Fou! (Peace From Chicago Mix)" – 9:16 (Minos Pour Main Basse (Sur La Ville)) # "Visible, Solution Pour Verres De Contacts" – 4:24 (Mr Learn & Fisherman) ==References== Category:1997 albums Category:Étienne de Crécy albums
title: Super Discount
